page.title: 02DUDLEY CUSTOMS
page.content: {Local delicacies,}such as Groaty pudding, faggots and peas and pigs trotters are among the fare offered at the popular{Black Country Evenings} which flourish in the area.On these occasions there is usually plenty to drink and enterainment by comedians, singers and groups in the local dialect exemplified by Aynuck and Ayli.Traditionally food had to be filling as many occupations involved great physical effort.The importance of the 'local' inn with home brewed ale reflecting the hot furnaces of the {nailer and chainmaker.}
